casebody.data:
No. 08-1191. Robert Morrison, et al., Petitioners v. National Australia Bank Ltd., et al. 559 U.S. 999, 130 S. Ct. 2060,

176 L. Ed. 2d 224,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2344. March 19, 2010.

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted. Justice Soto-mayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
